import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet'; import React, { Component, Fragment } from 'react'; class Register extends Component{ state = { username: "", usernameError: "", matric: "", matricError: "", password: "", passwordError: "", role: "", roleError: "" } change = (event) => { [event.tar] } render(){ return( Nimelssa quiz - Registeration page
Craete Account
account_box {this.setState({ username : event.target.value })}} />
edit { this.setState({ matric : event.target.value })}} />
lock { this.setState({ password : event.target.value })}} />
account_circle { this.setState({ role : event.target.value })}} />


) } } export default Register;
